member.name: F:Atom.Xna.Effects.PostProcess.BloomSettings.BaseSaturation

member.summary: After this call all drawn sprites are rendered to this ; instead of the previously set RenderTarget.
member.param: Flags indicating which surfaces to clear.

New depth value that this method stores in the depth buffer. This parameter can be in the range of 0.0 through 1.0 (for z-based or w-based depth buffers). A value of 0.0 represents the nearest distance to the viewer; a value of 1.0 represents the farthest distance.
Integer value to store in each stencil-buffer entry. This parameter can be in the range of 0 through 2n1, where n is the bit depth of the stencil buffer.
